what: Event Observations for NIF Data Sets
title: Event Observations for NIF Data Sets
text: nifevent provides functions add event observations nif data sets explore events.

title: Event Observations for NIF Data Sets
text: can install development version nifevent like :

title: Append event observations — add_event_observation
code: add_event_observation(   nif,   sdtm,   domain,   testcd = NULL,   event_filter,   event_diff = FALSE,   analyte = NULL,   parent = NULL,   metabolite = FALSE,   cmt = NULL,   subject_filter = "!ACTARMCD %in% c('SCREENFAIL', 'NOTTRT')",   observation_filter = "TRUE",   DTC_field = NULL,   keep = NULL,   debug = FALSE,   silent = NULL )

title: Append event observations — add_event_observation
text: nif nif object. sdtm sdtm object. domain domain code character. testcd testcode xxTESTCD xx domain code, character. used NULL. event_filter filter term characterize events extract, character. event_diff retain events change event filter evaluating TRUE FALSE previous observation, .e., apply time differentiation observation. logical. Defaults FALSE. analyte name analyte. Defaults 'EV_testcd', NULL. parent name parent analyte observation character. Defaults value 'analyte' NULL. metabolite observation metabolite, logical. cmt compartment observation, numeric. subject_filter filter applied DM domain, character. observation_filter filtering apply observation source data, character. DTC_field field use date-time code observation. Defaults 'xxDTC', xx domain name, NULL. keep Columns keep, character. debug Add debug information, logical. silent Suppress messages, logical. Defaults nif_option setting NULL.

title: Kaplan-Meier plot for events — kmplot
code: kmplot(   nif,   analyte,   dose = NULL,   group = NULL,   convert_tafd_h_to_d = TRUE,   title = NULL,   y_label = NULL,   silent = NULL,   ... )

title: Kaplan-Meier plot for events — kmplot
text: nif nif object. analyte analyte. dose dose, defaults doses, NULL. group Grouping variable. convert_tafd_h_to_d Convert TAFD field hours days, defaults TRUE. title plot title, defaults none NULL. y_label y axis label, defaults analyte, NULL. silent Suppress messages, logical. Defaults nif_option setting NULL. ... Arguments passed survminer::ggsurvplot conf.int logical value. TRUE, plots confidence interval. pval logical value, numeric string. logical TRUE, p-value added plot. numeric, computet p-value substituted one passed parameter. character, customized string appears plot. See examples - Example 3. surv.median.line character vector drawing horizontal/vertical line median survival. Allowed values include one c("none", "hv", "h", "v"). v: vertical, h:horizontal. risk.table Allowed values include: TRUE FALSE specifying whether show risk table. Default FALSE. "absolute" "percentage". Shows absolute number percentage subjects risk time, respectively. "abs_pct" show absolute number percentage. "nrisk_cumcensor" "nrisk_cumevents". Show number risk , cumulative number censoring events, respectively.

title: Make event observation — make_event
code: make_event(   sdtm,   domain,   testcd,   event_filter,   event_diff = FALSE,   analyte = NULL,   parent = NULL,   metabolite = FALSE,   cmt = NA,   subject_filter = "!ACTARMCD %in% c('SCRNFAIL', 'NOTTRT')",   observation_filter = "TRUE",   DTC_field = NULL,   keep = NULL,   silent = NULL )

title: Make event observation — make_event
text: sdtm sdtm object. domain domain code character. testcd testcode xxTESTCD xx domain code, character. used NULL. event_filter filter term characterize events extract, character. event_diff retain events change event filter evaluating TRUE FALSE previous observation, .e., apply time differentiation observation. logical. Defaults FALSE. analyte name analyte. Defaults 'EV_testcd', NULL. parent name parent analyte observation character. Defaults value 'analyte' NULL. metabolite observation metabolite, logical. cmt compartment observation, numeric. subject_filter filter applied DM domain, character. observation_filter filtering apply observation source data, character. DTC_field field use date-time code observation. Defaults 'xxDTC', xx domain name, NULL. keep Columns keep, character. silent Suppress messages, logical. Defaults nif_option setting NULL.
